description: Shared test fixtures for glossary normalization tests across all implementations

normalize_text_tests.name: no_glossary_terms
normalize_text_tests.description: Should preserve text without glossary terms
normalize_text_tests.input: This is just random text without any specific terminology
normalize_text_tests.expected: This is just random text without any specific terminology

normalize_text_tests.name: simple_replacement
normalize_text_tests.description: Should replace alternative with canonical term

normalize_text_tests.name: multiple_occurrences
normalize_text_tests.description: Should replace multiple occurrences of the same term
normalize_text_tests.input: The charger is ready. Another charger is over there.
normalize_text_tests.expected: The charge point is ready. Another charge point is over there.

normalize_text_tests.name: preserve_surrounding_text
normalize_text_tests.description: Should preserve text before and after replacements

normalize_text_tests.name: word_boundaries
normalize_text_tests.description: Should respect word boundaries and not replace partial matches

normalize_text_tests.name: mixed_terms
normalize_text_tests.input: The EV uses a charging station for charging
normalize_text_tests.expected: The electric vehicle uses a charge point for charging

normalize_text_tests.name: sentence_case
normalize_text_tests.description: Should handle terms at sentence start
normalize_text_tests.input: Charger is ready. The e-car arrived.
normalize_text_tests.expected: charge point is ready. The electric vehicle arrived.

edge_cases.name: newlines
edge_cases.expected:
First charge point
Second charge point
